description: This file is the entry point for a React-based weather dashboard web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styles, and the main App component. It contains a self-invoking function to warn about missing or misconfigured environment variables related to the OpenWeather API key, and it renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' using React 18's createRoot API.

methods.name: warnMissingOpenWeatherKeyOnce
methods.description: Self-invoking function that warns at most once if the REACT_APP_OPENWEATHER_API_KEY environment variable is missing or if the incorrectly named REACT_APP_REACT_APP_OPENWEATHER_API_KEY is set.
